# unregisterAvailabilityObserver(_:)

**Instance Method**

Unregisters an object from observing changes to the photo library’s availability.

## Declaration

```swift
func unregisterAvailabilityObserver(_ observer: any PHPhotoLibraryAvailabilityObserver)
```

## Parameters

- **observer**: The observer object to unregister.

## Observing Library Availability

- **register(_:)**: Registers an object to observe changes to the photo library’s availability.
- **PHPhotoLibraryAvailabilityObserver**: A protocol to adopt to have the system notify your app when the availability of a photo library changes.
- **unavailabilityReason**: An error that describes the reason the photo library isn’t available.
